name: Active Ragdoll
description:
Welcome to Goo Thing! An active ragdoll demo (for now).

If you have any ideas feel free to post in comments

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Mouse 0 - Grab Left
  • Mouse 1 - Grab Right
  • V - Kick
  • E - Grappler
  • T - Spawn Dynamite
  • G - Explode
  • P - Restart Level
